pages.text: Cold-blooded and venomous, snakes have long been a symbol of the dark arts.

Take caution when seeking a snake for a companion, for a 'flexible' nature is required to keep a snake, and to tap into the twisted magics they find most appealing. $(br2)Also, beware of their poisonous bite, since it can be rather lethal...$(br2)$(o)Trus-ss-st in me!
